title: [Ta'Illistim, BriarStone Keep]
description: A small guardhouse stands at the bottom of the keep's massive stone wall.  Lanterns hung along the walk light the way towards BriarStone Court.  Several city guardsmen hurry to and fro, going about the daily business of keeping the monarch and her people safe.
A small guardhouse stands at the bottom of the keep's massive stone wall.  Several city guardsmen hurry to and fro, going about the daily business of keeping the monarch and her people safe.

A small guardhouse stands in the lee of the city's tall, protective wall.  Thrown into shadow by the dominating bulk of BriarStone Keep just up the hill, the building is connected to the rest of the city by a steeply winding walkway, complete with switchback.  Several lit lanterns line the path.

A small guardhouse stands in the lee of the city's tall, protective wall.  Thrown into shadow by the dominating bulk of BriarStone Keep just up the hill, the building is connected to the rest of the city by a steeply winding walkway, complete with switchback.
